website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, attractive, and easy-to-use option for storing and organizing bath toys.
pros: This is a top pick for a freestanding organizer
Customers liked the durability and design of the model
It also gets top marks for draining well and being portable
cons: A few felt it was on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Good, could be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, and holds a lot of bath toys. I would like it more if it were a little bigger. I like that it is simple and neutral. Probably won't use it to scoop toys from the tub, but just to store and drain the toys. My daughter only uses a few toys per bath. We previously had a mesh bag that suctioned to the tub wall, but it kept falling. I'll store this in the tub when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I like it. I’ve tried those hanging baskets that you ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I’ve tried those hanging baskets that you suction on the wall but then I bump into it when taking a shower and the toys fall everywhere...ugh, I hate that! This sits right outside the bathtub and looks simple and even pretty. Easy to clean (unlike all the suction ones that get disgusting with mold on the suctions and the wall). I bought this after the Ubbi diaper pail and I’m very happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: PS Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: If it's too small, you have too many bath toys.
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is fantastic and has totally solved our perpetually-damp-and-moldy bath toy issues. (Except for the rubber duckies, but I've given up on those!) When bathtime's over, we scoop up all the toys, let them drip dry in the tub for a bit, then move them out of the tub to the tray. The kids even use the scoop and the tray as toys sometimes. The caddy isn't huge, but if we had more toys, the kids probably wouldn't have enough room in the tub to play!
customer_reviews.author: Heed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for an adult and kids shared bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Sharing a bath with kids you are always having to deal with annoying toys in the way when you go to take a shower with no place to put them and bath toys tha stay wet get gross for the tub and the toys. This amazing device solves both those problems! It sits nicely right outside the tub and is the perfect place to store toys out of the way, the size was perfect and didn't take up a ton of space. The bottom collects all the water so you can just dump it out and your bath toys and floor don't get wet and gross
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This is a much better way to store bath toys for kids than hanging up a mesh bag with suction cups. This is cute and my son can just reach over the tub to grab what he wants to play with as I keep it off to the side. You can clean it whenever you want and it's just an easy to use product that has made my life easier in maintaining some sort of organization with bath toys. I would purchase this again over any of the ones that hang in the actual bath as those are just in the way and can collect mildew.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Ross

customer_reviews.title: Declutters the shower space.
customer_reviews.text: I hate bathroom clutter. Especially in the shower. We share our bathroom with the kids and this is a great way to keep their toys out of he shower space when they are not in use. At shower time I grab the bucket and set it in the shower. When they are done they pile all the toys back in and I can put the bucket back onto the base to drain. We keep it tucked in corner of the bathroom out of the way. I was worried it wouldn't hold all of their toys and little buckets but it holds everything with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Practical Toy Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little bath toy organizer. The strainer at the bottom is such a smart idea! It makes cleaning up the bath toys so much easier and keeps mold and mildew away for longer. The only bummer to this product is how small it is. It's a Tetris game getting all the toys to fit. It doesn't fit large toys. If its an awkward shape it takes up room and doesn't fit any other toys. If you have a lot of bath toys I would suggest to find a bigger product or buy a couple of these. Overall I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Warning!!! Does not come with all the content listed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Ubbi Bath Toy Gift Set and its says right in the description: CONTENT: (1) toy drying bin (4) interchangeable toys (3) starfish (1) cloud and droplet set and (3) squeeze toys. I received it and it only came with the bin and 3 squeeze toys. I returned and got a replacement and it happened again. If you are expecting everything to be included like the description says then do not buy, but if you care okay with just the bin and 3 squeeze toys than this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Fetter

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Cute, Awesome Toys
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer and the toys are so cute and easy to clean! My daughter loves the little starfish suction toys, and they stick sooo well. She often takes them out of the tub to play with. I use the raindrop and rain cloud toys to get her attention so I can wash her hair. Works like a charm! The organizer is cute and compact. I’m glad because I have a small bathroom. It fits right on the side of the tub, and is so easy to clean when water pools below. I would gift this to a friend too - it’s the kind of thing you didn’t know you needed but then can’t live without!
customer_reviews.author: Janet I.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well and we finally have a clean tub after bath time!
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use and just makes the overall bath time much more enjoyable. We scoop the toys out every night and rest it in the base, the scoop makes it very easy to get all the toys at once and we just rinse the base each night. We don't use the suction and just store on the floor next to the tub. Looks stylish next to the tub and better than a hanging toy holder. Those would always fall down in the middle of the night and scare us thinking something was going wrong in the house. We are very happy with this organizer and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Coff

customer_reviews.title: 6 Stars! Just what I was wanting.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. We’ve had one of the net toy holders for a while and it just looks so ugly and cluttered to have all of the bath toys in view all the time. I wanted some kind of bin that I could use to collect the toys so that I could store them in the bathroom closet but they could also still drain. This works perfectly. It looks nice, and it’s very functional; the shape is good, and it drains well. 10/10 totally recommend this if you want a container instead of a mesh toy holder. I wish I had found this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kerby

customer_reviews.title: best bath toy storage
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST for bath toy storage! We tried a net thing that suctioned on the tub walls but it didn't fit right in our tub because of rounded walls, didn't suction anywhere, just didn't work. I've read lots of reviews on other options that get mildewy from being constantly wet- we actually keep this outside the tub, so it dries out pretty well, and it holds ALL the million toys our two little girls have accumulated. Looks nice, stays out of the way, lets the toys dry pretty well, checks all the boxes for me!
customer_reviews.author: richa521

customer_reviews.title: Great way to hold the bath toys
customer_reviews.text: Great way to hold the bath toys. I have found the nets get most easily and the suction cups never last. This little basket holds a ton and my two year old loves cleaning up by scooping all her toys up. I just sit it back on the base and then empty the base of water so no sitting water which leads to no mold! Really love this!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy holder!
customer_reviews.text: Simple design and works great. This is hard plastic that is durable and so far has held up well. I love that is drains into the lower basin which is easy to dump out and toys have a chance to dry. I have tried many different storage items for bath toys (like those nets that suction cup to the side of the tub that all started to become moldy and gross) but I really prefer this- it is durable and easy to clean- you can scoop the toys right out of the tub, shake out a little, and then set in the tray for the inevitable extra water to shed off the toys.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and smart
customer_reviews.text: I am all about having my home be clutter free and with kids this can be quite the task. I was getting frustrated with the number of toys just laying in the tub after bath time and it seemed that the suction cup pocket bags just wouldn't hold everything and still stay stuck on the shower wall. This was a great solution- it is compact, but holds all of the toys easily and doesn't look like a bright pink basket hanging out in the bathroom (it's well camouflaged). I like that it has a drain at the bottom and that I can clean it effortlessly. Overall, I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best organization for my son's bath toys
customer_reviews.text: We keep it mostly in the tub, with the blue base in the closet for when we take the bin out of the bath. My 16 mo son loves to take his toys out during bath time, he tips the bin on it's side and uses it as a slide for his toys, then when the bath is over he happily puts his toys back in. We tried a mesh organizer that suctioned to the tile wall, but it wasn't nearly as good as this bin is! I expect it will work long through toddler-hood.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: This is tiny!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I only looked at the picture not the measurements so shame on me. Beware this is the size of a very small wastebasket you might use in a bathroom you could only store a few very small items in it. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for bath toys!
customer_reviews.text: The best bath toy bin! We have one of those tiled tub/showers where anything that uses suction cups on the walls doesn't work. Everything just falls off. Needed something that sits outside of the tub to help drain and dry the toys to prevent mold. This was great! Big enough to fit a good amount of toys and has a drip tray underneath to catch all the water. Even better it allows you to store your bath toys outside of the bath so it doesn't look as cluttered in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: jenerationmama

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Holds a lot of my sons bath toys and it’s not even completely full yet. If it doesn’t hold everything then you have to many things LOL. Also has holes at the bottom for easy water drain with a detachable bottom to dump it out.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle_H

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would have got this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t have something to gather all the bath toys this one is great! We have tried the mesh netting which just gets extremely gross. This bucket wipes clean and has a water drip bucket (the gray part) which is really nice. Also when guests come to stay it is easy to take this in and out of the tub and hide under the cabinet. I wish I would have got this one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: viickiielynn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath standing toy storage. We don’t like the other products from other companies that only offer the option of storage meshes with suction cups that don’t stick to the wall. This is so convenient. It is so easy to collect the toys from the bath too. A real time saver when having a little one who loves lots of bath toys. Easy to clean! Very happy! Will definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: staner

customer_reviews.title: SO much nicer!
customer_reviews.text: I had a little bag holding my boys' bath toys for so long, and then a friend showed me this wonderful thing - now the toys are out of the tub, they actually dry out, and that ratty bag is in the garbage. It's so nice to be able to just dump all the toys in the tub at once, and then very easy for my boys and I to get them back into the basket. It's almost a game (just don't tell them!).
customer_reviews.author: Boymom82

customer_reviews.title: Packaging nightmare
customer_reviews.text: The toy holder itself is fine. Works to hold my daughters random bath toys that usually sit on the side of the tub. My issue is the adhesive they used to stick the cardboard label on the basket itself; took me 2 hours to get it off, and even still there’s residue stuck on there because I finally gave up. It must’ve melted in the heat on the UPS truck or whatever, but it was horrendous!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE! HIGHLY Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am not using the suction part of this product and opt to just have it sit on the floor. I am SO happy with this purchase! I love that I can quickly place all the bath toys in here and the water drains to the bottom. When I dump them in for the next bath, I easily clean the bottom catch. I would definitely put this on a must have baby registry!!
customer_reviews.author: taylor.mb

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the Suction cup storage that constantly fall off the wall!
customer_reviews.text: We love this storage bin. There is no mounting to the wall and it doesn't take valuable space in our shower/tub. We had one of the suction cup ones before but it kept falling off the wall and what a scare in the middle of the night! This is the perfect solution. Holds a lot of toys too. We bought this in addition to the squeeze toys from Ubbi and are super happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Klein

customer_reviews.title: Missing toys from the Ubbi Bath Toy Gift Set
customer_reviews.text: I sent the Ubbi Bath Toy Gift Set to my daughter. Unfortunately, all she received was the toy drying bin and the 3 squeeze toys. Missing from the gift set were the: (4) interchangeable toys, (3) starfish and (1) cloud and droplet set. Being a new mom, I really don't want her to have to deal with the return to Amazon. I'm not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: easteregg06

customer_reviews.title: Keeps bath toys from getting moldy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a year and am thrilled with how it’s kept the toys clean and dry. The water drips through the bottom and is caught in a tray the inner container sits in. I check periodically to toss any standing water that’s been caught in the bottom part as my kids don’t think to empty it after the wet toys are tossed in. It’s kept toys from getting moldy and fits on the side of my tub. I wish I had found it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This set is a must! I’ve always hated bath toys because of the fear of mold growing but these are so easy to take apart and clean after bath time! The toy bin is super cute and the perfect way to store any bath toys, it’s not huge - a little smaller then I was picturing but still perfect for bath time clean up without a watery mess! One note I do have is if the toys are not fully tightened really well you do get some leakage from the opening but overall I would 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toy bin!! It's easy to clean and water doesn't collect in the main part. Cute design, very compact. I bought this obviously to keep all his toys together but also to limit how many bath toys we can have.. they all fit in this little bin so I get to tell people not to buy more "I don't have anywhere to put them!" :)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: It’s actually awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was way better than I ever expected! It’s large, sturdy, totally functional and I don’t have to deal with it constantly sliding off a wall. Fits all my three year old’s bath toys in it with room for more. Wish I would have bought this earlier... one of those items I didn’t realize I actually needed in my life!
customer_reviews.author: MamaGioiosa

customer_reviews.title: Size is perfect!!! Not too small not to big! Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for a few months now. I must say we love it! I’ve read the reviews and many people complained about size being small. I think it’s perfect for us and in general. My kids don’t have a lot of tub toys and I’m okay with that. You can easily remove it to be out of the way. This doesn’t have a suction to go on the wall or tub and that is the best, in my opinion. Not more ugly displays anymore! Best Buy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dump your mesh bath toy holder
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find a mesh bath toy holder that would work well for a textured shower. Came across this on sale and SO GLAD I DID. This is 100x smarter design than those mesh hanging holders. Water is drained away, and I was pleasantly surprised at how much it holds! And, to boot, it’s way more neutral than all those bright blue things. Easily attractive enough to leave out 24/7!
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: My one year old loves these, I love knowing that he can play with something in the tub that is sturdy, easy to wash and keep clean. No more squirting mold and mildew out of other toys. Some of the toys are a little bulky and hard for little hands to play with which is the only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for our bathroom - though smaller than I'd thought ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our bathroom - though smaller than I'd thought it would be (I didn't look at actual measurements before ordering), it still holds a lot of toys. It also fits nicely in the corner next to our tub. The draining function is just as advertised, and this is easy to scoop toys out of the tub with. It also seems durable, though I can't say for sure since we've only had it a few months. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Great toy holder so easy to use and durable
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this bath toy holder. I went through 3 mesh hanging bags that never worked to this. it fits so well in our shower and my daughter loves to even help throw all the toys in. The white part has large holes for the water to drain from the toys and you can pour the water out of the bottom. super easy to clean. I won't need another toy bin for the bath ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Kel-Z

customer_reviews.title: 💘 LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These are a game changer and I wish I would have got these sooner. Everything is dishwasher safe and super easy to clean. My boys love bath time and we were buying regular bath toys every couple of weeks because I was scared of mold growing. This saved us SOO much money, I wish we would have purchased this sooner. My 4 year old and 1 1/2 year old both love all the toys that come in this, the storage container will also hold way more than what came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for bath toys!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect!! No more suction cups and smelly basket that constantly falls off the wall. I love how this can go outside the tub and still look nice. It's easy to clean and allows toys to drip dry. I agree with others... it's a good size, but if it's too small, you have too many bath toys.
customer_reviews.author: RugbYogi

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bin with easy drain options.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. The problem that I've had with other toy bins is they are either a net and the water runs all over the floor, tile, etc. OR they are a bin with no drain option. What I like about this storage bin is that it lifts up from the bottom and the excess water remains while the toys dry. So I didn't have to try and hold the bin upside down to drain the water while trying my best not to let toys fall out. Out of all the bath bins we've tried before this is definitely my favorite and fits perfectly on our tub ledge.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a solution for bath toys that WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several suction cup bath toy holders and with each one they fell. We don't even have a lot of bath toys, so this drove me batty. Finally we switched to this stand alone bath toy holder. It fits right between the toilet and the tub for easy stow away and is SO easy to clean. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Simple but well designed
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed in a bath toy organizer. The tile in our shower doesn’t allow for good suction cup strength, so the many many suction cup wall organizers failed repeatedly and frustratingly for us. This bin is plenty big enough for our son’s many bath toys, sits very sturdily on the ground next to the tub, and allows for easy drainage and toy scoopage. It checks every box for us. It’s simple but so well designed.
customer_reviews.author: saud

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bath toy organizer. It holds a lot of bath toys, is super easy to clean, durable and well made. The only thing that would make this better is if there was some sort of hanging capability or something. The footprint is too big to fit in our niche, shower organizer, or corner of the tub so we just have to take it out of the tub whenever my husband or I need to take a shower. Not a deal breaker, but slightly irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had found this years ago! After baths you just put all toys into the bin, all the water will drain into the bottom part. Later on, whenever you think about it, clean out the bottom! No more moldy toys!!!! I will be giving these as baby gifts in the future along with the silicone baby plates that stick down! Make your life easier, and purchase one of these babies!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Allen

customer_reviews.title: Functional, nice neutral color, best bath toy organizer on the market
customer_reviews.text: Love this bath toy holder. It is cute and very functional. Easy to scoop up toys, the water drains out the bottom, and then any additional water drains to the grey part and can be dumped. Nothing falling off the walls because it it doesn’t stick. Love the neutral grey and white color of it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: Great toy storage for the bath!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love this toy storage, and it’s so much easier than trying to round all of the toys up into some net that is supposed to stick to the wall. It works exactly like it’s supposed to, and my girls have fun loading all the toys right back into the container when their bath is over
customer_reviews.author: PrettyBittyBugs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bath toys!! So easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for bath toys! I wanted something that I can store underneath the bathroom sink instead of in the bathtub because it would take up space there and my son plays with a lot of big actions figures in the bath. It works perfectly and all you have to do it take off the grey bottom and dump out all the access water from the toys. Genius!!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Lazo

customer_reviews.title: Good non suction bath toy holder.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It’s nice looking and fits right in the corner. The suction cup ones never work so was looking for something without them. Even though this sits on the floor it is slim and takes up little space, but it’s tall so fits lots of toys. I also like how it has the basin so the water can drain.
customer_reviews.author: R. Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks good too
customer_reviews.text: Wish I bought this the 1st time around before struggling to get things to stick to my wonderful brand new shower surround. Every bathtime I dump the toys and there is little to no water in the catch tray meaning that air gets in there to dry it out which will cut down on cleaning! Also looks really good in the bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: GalDiesel

customer_reviews.title: Ubbi makes good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Mom and toddler approved. I love that its slim and i can store it between the toilet and tub - and also wash it in the dishwasher. I do sometimes wish it had suction cups for use inside the tub while he plays, but no big deal, and my fault for not ordering one with suctions. Still a fan.
customer_reviews.author: kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES the bath toys. He starts adding his toys to the water before I can even fill up the bath. The toys are easy to clean and even come apart so you can clean the inside of them. I love the storage container that comes with the toys. It helps the toys to drain the water as well as keep them together. Once the toys are dry you can dump the excess water and clean the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outside the tub storage
customer_reviews.text: The fact that I can use this as a scoop is just perfect! It has a separate tray for catching the runoff but the toys don't sit in the pool of water either. The holes for drainage are large but not too large for the toys to fall through. It's also large enough to hold all of our bath toys but not too large that it takes up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rashid

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Bathroom Toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my kiddos bathroom toys. These are AMAZING. I can scoop the toys up, leave them in the back of the tub until the water drys out since it has holes to drain and then easily place them away until the next day. This has made bath time clean up a breeze. Wish I had found these much much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for storing bath toys
customer_reviews.text: I got this to corral my 4-year-old's bath toys. I was concerned that it would be too small but it is bigger than it looks in the pictures. It's the perfect size for us. She loves that she can pick up her own toys while this sits in the bath. My only complaint: why didn't I buy this 2 years ago?
customer_reviews.author: bbilly

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design, great functionality
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bin and holds a nice amount of toys. I like that it isn’t too cumbersome and doesn’t stick out garishly in the bathroom. Best of all, the water can drain out of the toys to keep them dry and fresh. Handle is helpful so you can use it to scoop toys out of tub water.
customer_reviews.author: Finest018

customer_reviews.title: I love this toy organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy organizer!! It's cute and the perfect size for my baby's toys. I love how i don't have to worry about water collecting at the bottom and yucky mold growing! Cleaning up after bath time has become super easy and quick! You will not regret buying this, to me it's definitely worth the money. I also would like to recommend their anti mold bath toys by Ubbi, they're really cute and the fact that you can open them and clean the inside so no mold grows makes them a must have in my book!! :) Happy Shopping
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Just needed a place for all the bath toys to collect. This holds a good deal of items and has a place in the bottom to collect dropped water. It's basically a trash can with an extra compartment in the bottom so your stuff doesn't sit in water. But you kinda can see that from the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this sooner?!
customer_reviews.text: This contraption is brilliant! It's perfect for those who want to store bath toys outside of the tub. I love that I can just scoop up all of the toys and plop it in the bottom part without having to worry about water leaking everywhere. We've been through several different bath toy storage contraptions, none of which have worked because they always fall off of the wall. This is the perfect solution!
customer_reviews.author: Ep86

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all his bath time toys. Just let it sit in the tub with the wet toys to drain out of the bottom. BUT works great and easy to clean. My 2 year old loves having a space for just his bathtime toys. He even cleans his bathtime toys up himself now.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Seriously buy this bath toy bin!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best bath toy holder ever! Bath toys were a nightmare before we found this. I love that it has a separate bottom that collects the excess water that you just simply pour out. It's cute and stylish in our bathroom, and it's the perfect size. Would buy 100 times again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This basket works well for small bath toys for toddlers. As long as it’s left in a well ventilated place in the bathroom, toys dry with no problem. Seems pretty durable and I'm sure it will last a long while. My only issue it that I wish the bottom (grey piece) and the top (white piece) actually connected. It’s difficult to pick up with two separate pieces.
customer_reviews.author: KLC

customer_reviews.title: Best idea ever!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a 2.5 year old dragon child who insists on have 18 million bath toys all in at once but pretends they don’t know how to clean them up as they run buck naked down the hallway while you drain the tub, this is the product for you! Grab the bucket, scoop up the toys in one fell swoop, slam that SOB down in its holster to drain, and catch that toddler dragon before they decide to do naked parkour in your bedroom. This product is really handy and I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Leach

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I'd prefer something that suctions the wall, but didn't want to take the risk and time of ordering products that would possibly fall down and having to return. This product is simple, no fuss, and is fairly minimal sitting on the corner of the tub ledge. I rate it 5 stars for performance/functionality, but 4 stars overall because I think it was a bit overpriced at $20 for a plastic bin.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. The toy organizer I had before would not stick to the tile. It would fall some in the middle of the night and scare the bejeesus out of me. Or fall on my head while I tried to relax after my son was asleep for the night. But this is perfect. It’s a great size and doesn’t scream toddler. Don’t buy any other bath toy organizer-this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: It’s great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item used daily greT for holding toys in my bathroom I keep it on the side of the Toliet . They need these in colors that be so great for blending with bathroom decor but so far I look The item since my child plays with toys now in the tub
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for my small bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: This bath toy holder is pretty simple and great. Water drains through holes in the bottom onto a tray that the holder sits in. Easy to remove and dump excess water in bath. Small footprint sits next to my tub in my small bathroom unnoticed. Only downside is my son can go digging through it and take his toys into other parts of the house.
customer_reviews.author: firekrkr

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10 - fun and easily cleanable!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. It keeps all of our kids toys conveniently in one area with just a scoop. We absolutely LOVE the fact we can toss it in the dishwasher when it starts to get dirty. This is a BIG plus. Not only would I buy this again, but I am recommending it to all of my friends as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy bucket
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to spend $20 on this, but I would much rather have this, than a suction cup hanger that molds and doesn’t stick to the shower. And this is cute and helps to keep our bathroom organized and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for a better solution for our bath toys, and this is it! The typical net bag had broken and toys were overflowing everywhere and not drying properly. This bucket helps immensely in controlling the toys. It's also very easy to clean and drain.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ballen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I had problems with toys staying wet and then getting smelly and creating wet spots on the floor...I thought these were super overpriced but I was wrong. They dry toys out and the bottom trays dry out quickly so you don't have to worry about gross stagnant water collecting. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine A. Sterrett

customer_reviews.title: Good drainage
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the suction cup and net bathtub toy holders. I just set the whole thing in the tub with my little one and leave it there after I drain it, take it out and place it in the caddy. Sturdy and drains well.
customer_reviews.author: JulieMoon86

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy for infants
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for an infant and it has outstanding durability. It is really good at teaching cognitive and learning functions to a child. Keeps them highly entertained. I highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Angel T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs and a good size for my kids toys. I dont keep a ton of toys but there is a decent amount and this holds them all. I love that after its dry enough i just put it outside the tub, i was having a hard time finding something that would suction and stay on my shower wall. But everything failed, this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: zerlina mendivil

customer_reviews.title: Like a cute trashcan
customer_reviews.text: This tub toy bin is perfect for my means. My 6-year-old still loves having play items in the tub. This includes Barbies, duckies, alligators, a toy collander, etc. These items either have been remaining in my tub or on the floor outside the tub during non-bath time. I had trouble finding something large enough to hold everything that would also allow for drainage. This is perfect. It's about the size of our bathroom trash can but cuter.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Clever Bath Toy Storage
customer_reviews.text: It's worth paying more $ for this storage item. It takes up a small amount of space, can be used as toy scoop in the water, & drains into separate compartment. My son likes the smiley face design on 1 side. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Jamie A.

customer_reviews.title: Mildew free and out of the way toys
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described- non suction-they didn't work In our shower-so this scoops everything up and drains a little then drains the rest in the gray bottom which u pour out.so it doesn't get moldy.just leave it on the floor so the bath stays classy and not kiddie looking.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Parent must have
customer_reviews.text: It’s a medium size bin I would say. Perfect for the amount of bath toys we have. It’s honestly a need if you have a child like mine who takes a bath filled with toys. Clean up process is so much easier and she actually enjoys “dunking” them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and modern look!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking around for the perfect bath toy collector as the ones on the wall doesn't seem to hold much or they fall off wall and just wanted something simple to pick up the toys and still looks aesthetically pleasing. This does the trick and it has bigger holes on the bottom for quick drainage. Also easy to scoop toys up in at the end of the bath which is a bonus and actually use the holder as a way to scoop water and wash out hair so bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh L Sumner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - but ends up in the tub a lot
customer_reviews.text: Frankly this ends up in the tub along with the toys a lot, but it is a great size so it fits well between the toilet and tub. The handle makes scooping toys quick and it drains great. My one year old could fit in it - I’ve seen it - so it can hold plenty of bath toys.
customer_reviews.author: M. McCann

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hang on the wall.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why I thought this came with suction cups to hang it on the wall, but it doesn't, and that was really disappointing. I want the water to freely drain, not gather in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love! It is so nice to have the toys drain and then easily dump the water out and it’s great the toys aren’t sitting in the water. Also we can store the toys elsewhere instead of keeping them in the tub. Far superior to the mesh/suction cup toy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Pish

customer_reviews.title: The solution to wet bath toy mess
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was too small but holds a lot of bath toys. Dries them out well, and I really like the removable bottom tray so you can dump out excess water. And it looks nice! Win!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Much easier post bath cleanup than traditional suction toy holder!
customer_reviews.text: It's honestly great for heavier bath toys, and ones that have a lot of pieces (i.e. foam letters, fishing net and fish ect.) I was super sick of having to reapply my daughter's hanging toy holder all the time. It's such and awesome alternative and keeps my bath area clutter free!😊
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for you bath toy storage!
customer_reviews.text: Love that the color still works with our bathroom design overall. Great solution to have this sitting outside alongside the tub. Did not want to deal with suction cup bags or things that looked extremely kid colored. Perfect organization for us.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This does what it says and keeps the toys dry. All the water collects in the bottom tray. This is a very nice gift for young ones and their parents. Keeps the bathroom clean
customer_reviews.author: Mamasan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bucket for tub toys
customer_reviews.text: I love this bucket. It drains the water out on the bottom and keeps the toys dry. I don’t see where it suctions so didn’t review that piece but we just keep next to tub.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelylace

customer_reviews.title: Functional, stylish, and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It’s perfect for scooping out toys and cleaning them off and then letting them dry. I know some say it’s a glorified trash can - and maybe it is. But I’m a fan, and would highly recommend! This is my 6th baby, and function and style are important to me. This checks all the boxes!
customer_reviews.author: cblock

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought this from the start
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing a mesh bag and some other hook on or hanging bath toy receptacle, I wish I had just spent the money to buy this originally. It is a great and easy to use organizer, and i'm not frustrated trying to keep it hanging on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: SaucyAmes

customer_reviews.title: Just scoop the toys and store them away!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so thankful for Amazon reviews because I had given up on bath toy storage. This is perfect in every way and since my toddler has moved himself into my bathroom this gives me a little bit of my space back. The baby LOVES to put his bath toys away now!
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Only received the drying bin and 3 toys of the of the 13 toys.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Functional & cute
customer_reviews.text: This looks so much better in my bathroom than a pile of wet toys on the mat! It’s cute & functional, the grey base doubles as a scooper to collect toys and to dump water on the kids hair when rinsing out shampoo. Well worth the $11!
customer_reviews.author: Mama K

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great with decor. Not like most storage in that you can take the bottom off, easily, to dump any excess water out. Because of this I never worry about mold anymore.
customer_reviews.author: ClearlyOrganized

customer_reviews.title: Yay for bath clean up!
customer_reviews.text: I cant speak on the suction power cause I have it just standing on the floor next to the tub. However its great for storing all the toys, I have my toddler scoop up all his toys and he loves doing it. What a way to make clean up fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Core

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy Bin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little's bath toys. The draining feature in the bin is really nice - let's the toys dry with out getting yucky. It takes up very little space next to the bathtub and holds quite a bit. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Troma

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: Love that this has holes at the bottom for drainage and an option to cover that up. So much better than the Muchkin toy holder that kept falling off my tiles due to poor suction.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: The prior reviews made it seem small .. it holds a good amt of toys I love that the water drains to the bottom . Very well made and sturdy would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Use it to put bath toys after 3YO bath. It works better than laying out all toys on floor. The water from toys does drain down to bottom. Product is easy to clean. Be aware - It will not prevent mold on bath toys but it does help by allowing air through and draining water. Only four stars due to price...it’s expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: ChanH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, easy to throw in all kind of toy sizes and I love how easy this is to clean. Makes bath time so much smoother just throw everything in there and you’re done!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for water toys
customer_reviews.text: Great material, I've had it for a while now and no mold. Its also strong enough to with stand my rough 3 year old. Thats saying alot. This is a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Antman0

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and simple
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great drainage, easy to clean. Holds a reasonable amount of toys. Easy to use as a scoop while the tub has water in it and jiggle most of the water out then dock it in its drip tray.
customer_reviews.author: Delayed Gratification

customer_reviews.title: Love this bath toy storage!
customer_reviews.text: Spacious, holds all of our bath toys and drains the water into a separate tray to help prevent wet toys develop mold. This is exactly what we wanted, works perfectly! You can even use the bin to scoop up the toys out of the tub!
customer_reviews.author: k.maroon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Now I feel like we need a bigger one because ours is getting full. Works amazing and keeps the toys organized. Actually dries on its own. I just throw the toys in there every evening after bathtime.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

product_meta.title: Ubbi Freestanding Bath Toy Organizer Bath Caddy with Removable Drying Rack Bin and Scoop for Bath Toys for Toddlers + Baby, Gray
product_meta.description:
Style:Gray Bath Toy Drying BinThe Ubbi Bath Toy Drying Bin is designed with ingenuity in mind. This free standing bin allows you to conveniently contain bath toy clutter. Simply scoop the toys out of the tub using the whimsical handles and place the bin on its base. The large holes in the bin allow for fast drying, and the base collects excess water that can be poured out later. Easy to use and wash, this drying bin makes bath time clean up a breeze. PVC, BPA and Phthalate free. Dishwasher safe. 

Enter the world of Ubbi where innovative products are designed and created with parents and children in mind. Under the Ubbi name, you will find unique, quality products that are easy to use, helping to simplify parents'; lives while keeping babies as happy and safe as can be. Thanks to its award-winning can of steel, Ubbi is now a recognized brand worldwide. The Ubbi diaper pail is renowned for its ability to achieve maximum odor control and appreciated for offering the convenience and value of utilizing any standard trash bag or reusable cloth liner, a breakthrough in the diaper disposal market. With the same customer focused philosophy and innovative design capabilities, the Ubbi brand is now expanding its signature diapering selection and extending into the feeding category. A wide range of Ubbi branded products is now available for today's modern parents that are looking for stylish and functional baby essentials. From concept to final creation, the Ubbi team works together every step of the way to bring the best in design and value. The input of every member of the team is taken into account in the development of the Ubbi products, but consumer input is the most important as customer satisfaction is our primary goal.
feature_bullets: STORAGE SOLUTION: Bath Toys overcrowding your bath tub? Ubbi's got your solution with their Freestanding Bath Toy Organizer Bath Caddy with Removable Drying Rack Bin and Scoop. Perfect for keeping all those toys in check, and allowing them to air dry safely.
ADDITIONAL UBBI COLLECTIONS: Collections include diapering, toilet training, feeding, on-the-go, and nursery items!
EASY TO USE: Scoop up bath toys with the handle after bathtime, place bin in base, and leave until next bath time
2 PART SYSTEM: Bin and base make up this toy drying bin, with large draining holes at the bottom of the bin to allow for fast drying, and the base for storage
MODERN LOOK: This toy drying bin is amenable to modern home décor, without whimsical touches
CONVENIENT SIZE: Bin can hold a variety of different shapes and sizes of bath toys
DISHWASHER SAFE: If need be, the item can be cleaned in the dishwasher
PERFECT GIFT: A giftable and fun item for baby
VARIETY: Available in 2 beautifully neutral colors, Gray or Robin's Egg Blue, to match any bathroom decor. Each bin measures 7.5" width x 10" height x 7" depth allowing you maximum storage capacity
ADDITIONAL UBBI COLLECTIONS: Collections include diapering, toilet training, feeding, on-the-go, and nursery items
